title: An assessment of spent coffee grounds as a replacement for peat in the production of whisky: chemical and sensory analysis of new make spirits
content:

Kacper P. Krakowiak, Irene Baxter, Barry Harrison, Nicholas Pitts, Sam Fergusson, Nicholle G. A. Bell, David Ellis, Ruaraidh D. McIntosh
The chemical composition of whisky spirits produced using malt smoked with spent coffee grounds (SCG) in place of traditional peat was explored using a range of analytical techniques including sensory analysis.
